Sumi.Dialogue.GreenRain: T-this rain reminds me of The Ocean's Lament... It's both calming and stormy at the same time...
Sumi.Dialogue.GreenRain_2: The green rain is happening again... I-I hope it doesn't last long...
Sumi.Dialogue.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: @ ! Theres a monster in the house! #$b# AHHHHHH!!!
Sumi.Dialogue.SpouseStardrop: I-I found this burried with my Ocean's Lament merch pile... I want you to have it...
Sumi.Dialogue.MovieInvitation: Y-you wanna go to the movies..? Sure! I'll go!~
Sumi.Dialogue.RejectGift_Divorced: Y-you betrayed me... my only friend.. and now..?
Sumi.Dialogue.AcceptBirthdayGift: !!! You got me a gift for my birthday?!?! THANK YOU!~
Sumi.Dialogue.RejectBouquet: Y-you wanna go on a d-date..?#$b#U-umm I don't know you w-well enough...
Sumi.Dialogue.AcceptGift_Loved: !!! This is my favorite! Thank you thank you thank you!~
Sumi.Dialogue.AcceptGift_Liked: This is so nice! Thank you!
Sumi.Dialogue.AcceptGift_Disliked: I-is this supposed to be a gift..?
Sumi.Dialogue.RejectMovieTicket_AlreadyI: I-I'm sorry... I already have been invited by {0}...
Sumi.Dialogue.RejectMovieTicket_AlreadyW: I-I'm sorry... I've already gone this week...

Sumi.Dialogue.Tue4: ...I-I... I'm curious... to know if... umm...#$b#$4D-do you like me..? I-I mean... No one has ever spent this much time with me... Not like you... So...#$b#N-nevermind! D-don't answer that!

Sumi.Dialogue.Tue10: W-why don't we go on another date sometime this weekend?#$b#$1We could go to the theatre and see the newly released The Ocean's Lament: Forgotten Past movie!

Sumi.Dialogue.cc_Begin: Y-you're helping to fix the center?
Sumi.Dialogue.cc_Bus: The bus is fixed? Finally! We can get between Pelican Town and Spruceview so much easier now!~
Sumi.Dialogue.cc_Complete: Y-you fixed the community center..? I-I'm not really part of the community... but I guess I'll visit if you're there,
Sumi.Dialogue.movieTheater: A movie theater has been built?
Sumi.Dialogue.gotPet: You got a pet? What's it's name?
Sumi.Dialogue.pamHouseUpgrade: I heard you donated to help build a house for one of the residents in your town...
Sumi.Dialogue.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I heard someone donated to help build a house for someone in Pelican Town...
Sumi.Dialogue.wonGrange: You won the Grange Display? That's amazing!~
Sumi.Dialogue.wonEggHunt: You won the Egg Hunt? That's amazing!~
Sumi.Dialogue.wonIceFishing: You won the Ice Fishing Contest? That's amazing!~
Sumi.Dialogue.willyCrabs: D-do you know if Willy likes crabs..? He's one of the only people in the valley to talk to me... I wanna thank him with a gift...
Sumi.Dialogue.FullCrabPond: You have a full crab pond? nice.
Sumi.Dialogue.divorced_Sumi: I-I thought we had something special...
Sumi.Dialogue.Sumi0: I can't believe we're about to get married!$h
Sumi.Dialogue.Sumi1: I hope I don't get cold feet
